reused_details.reused: A statement from the Spanish FA said: "The RFEF would like to thank Luis Enrique and his entire coaching staff at the helm of the absolute national team in recent years.

reused_by_aic: 'The RFEF has chosen Luis de la Fuente as the new (Spain) coach,' RFEF said in a statement.

De la Fuente, 61, joined the RFEF in 2013 as the under-15 manager having worked with players like Marco Asensio, goalkeeper Unai Simon, Eric Garcia, Pau Torres, Pedri, Carlos Soler and Dani Olmo when they were youngsters.

reused_details.reused: Spain were dumped out of the tournament in Qatar on Tuesday after a surprise defeat to Morocco on penalties in the last 16.
reused_by_aic: Spain were beaten on penalties by Morocco after a goalless draw on Tuesday in an upset result after failing to turn their dominance into a victory.

reused_details.reused: Spain Under-21s head coach, Luis de la Fuente, has been appointed as Luis Enrique's replacement.
